value.title: Export one table of data or the entire model with DAX Studio
value.excerpt: In today's video I am going to show you how to export data from one table or the entire model using DAX Studio. #curbal #dax #daxstudio  Keynote: 02:00 Download data from one table with DAX Studio 02:40 Download the entire model with DAX Studio  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: DAX Beginners - SUM Vs SUMX in Power BI - What, When and Where?

First, I will explain When to use SUM and when to use SUMX. We will talk about the difference between SUM and SUMX functions

value.title: DAX Functions Overview - Date and Time Function in Power BI

value.title: Find and Remove Last Occurrence from a String using Power BI DAX

value.title: Creating Calendar Table in Power BI using DAX Functions

There are a couple of DAX functions which makes the process of creating a calendar table very simple and easy; Calendar() and CalendarAuto(). In this short video, I'll

value.title: DAX CrossFilter Function in Power BI   Write the Formula both directional but keep the relationship
value.excerpt: If you are familiar with relationships in Power BI, you know that there are scenarios that you may need to change the direction of the relationship to a both-directional. A both-directional relationship comes at a cost, which is mainly the performance and ambiguity of the model. There is a way to write

value.title: DAX Measure in the Axis of the Power BI Report
value.excerpt: If you even need to show your DAX measures in a chart without a dimension to slice and dice it, you won‚Äôt get a great experience in the visual. In this video, I‚Äôll share a trick that you can use to have a nice visualization like what you see in the above screenshot. Download the file and study more from

value.title: Dynamic Banding or Grouping in Power BI ‚Äì Using DAX Measures ‚Äì Choose the Size of Bins
value.excerpt: In the previous video, I explained how to create dynamic bins by choosing the count of bins in a slicer in the Power BI report. In this video, I'll explain, how you can do it the other way around, which is by selecting the size of the bin, you will have bins and buckets dynamically generated. Download
